alert.note: Alert for Camas Prairie; Owyhee Mountains; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 2:56PM MST until January 05 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MST /1 PM PST/ MONDAY TO 5 AM MST /4 AM PST/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 10 inches, except 1 to 3 feet inches above 6000 ft in the mountains. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph will create blowing snow. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Oregon and southwest and west central Idaho. * WHEN...From 2 PM MST /1 PM PST/ Monday to 5 AM MST /4 AM PST/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow may result in continuously covered roads, and snow will blow back on to the roads very soon after they are plowed..
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Camas Prairie; Owyhee Mountains; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
